Package com.rutaji.exaqua.util

Class ColorsToFloat

java.lang.Object
com.rutaji.exaqua.util.ColorsToFloat
public class ColorsToFloat extends Object
hand sieve has 17 textures. Each texture is represented with float value 0 and 2. This class help to choose and set texture. Each texture is represented with object of class Color.

  • Field Details

    • Colors

      public static List<Color> Colors
      List of all textures, except lava texture. Lava texture is reserve only for lava. When fluid that doesn't have it's texture set in NameToColor is encountered, the closest color from this list is choosen.
      See Also:
      • NameToColor
      • ComputeColor(net.minecraft.fluid.Fluid)

    • BLACK

      public static float UNKNOWN

    • NameToColor

      public static Hashtable<String,Float> NameToColor
      Holds pairs of fluids and textures. Textures are represented by their property value.

  • Constructor Details

    • ColorsToFloat

      public ColorsToFloat()

  • Method Details

    • Get

      public static float Get(String s)
      Returns property from NameToColor. If the fluid isn't in NameToColor it calls ComputeColor(net.minecraft.fluid.Fluid) returns the texture.
      Parameters:
      s - fluid that is contained in hand sieve.
      Returns:
      constant that refers to texture.

    • ComputeColor

      public static float ComputeColor(net.minecraft.fluid.Fluid fluid)
      Takes fluid and finds the closest texture to that color, according to hsv. Then adds the fluid and its color to NameToColor.
      Returns:
      returns color of the fluid.
